info.description: Control-plane is a central microservice of Service Mesh which is responsible for all the gateways configuration. For more information, visit our Documentation(https://github.com/Netcracker/qubership-core-control-plane/tree/main/README.md).
info.title: Control Plane API

delete.summary: Delete Deployment Version With ID V2

get.description: Get Microservice Versions from BG versions registry. Not every combination of the request params allowed,
get.summary: Get Microservice Versions from BG versions registry

post.description: Register Microservice Versions in BG versions registry.
post.summary: Register Microservice Versions in BG versions registry.

delete.description: Delete Microservice Versions from BG versions registry.
delete.summary: Delete Microservice Versions from BG versions registry.

cookieTTL.description: do not change the type. see above

forbidVirtualHosts.description:
ForbidVirtualHosts indicates whether registering virtual hosts for this gateway is forbidden.
Negative form is chosen to represent default value easily - `false` is default.

valid.description: Valid is true if Int64 is not NULL

clusterName.description: ClusterName here is a microservice family name, NOT cluster key: no port included! E.g. `trace-service`.

exists.description:
Exists indicates that it is CREATE request payload (not DELETE request). Field is optional and by default
request considered to be CREATE. Only explicit `false` value of this field will cause request to be
interpreted as DELETE.

services.description: Services contains family names of the microservices being deployed

version.description:
Version holds blue-green version of microservices being registered (or deleted).
Empty version field means that deploy is performed in rolling mode => ACTIVE version should be used.

route.description: Route is RO field to return in GET StatefulSession response. Ignored in requests.
